Simplify. Integrate. Track.

Simplified Vehicle Delivery…Integrated Mobile Solutions…Tracking System with Unlimited VINs…

Collect electronic proof of delivery information quickly and easily with VehicHaul’s mobile visibility app. With VehicHaul, automotive logistics carriers can streamline vehicle transportation tracking with a mobile solution that easily integrates with existing systems.

Simplify

You can quickly and easily push new loads to drivers, view loads en route, schedule delivery changes and obtain signatures electronically. Have a damaged vehicle? Simply take a photo, upload it to the VehicHaul mobile visibility app and choose the damage details.

Integrate

Mobile is driving the future of technology. In fact, your drivers rely on mobile for GPS, day-to-day communication and emergency services. Enhance the use of vehicle mobile technology by easily integrating the VehicHaul app into your daily business operations. VehicHaul integrates with any vehicle transportation management system so you don’t have to start from scratch. Instead, we strive to offer a smooth transition with VehicHaul’s user friendly mobile app, the ultimate ePod solution.

Track

VehicHaul serves as your virtual record keeper. Toss the paper trail and manage your drivers and loads with innovative vehicle mobile technology and a pricing structure that allows unlimited VINs. Observe business operations with a quick glance and keep your deliveries visible.

Pricing

VehicHaul will work with you to create a customized pricing package starting as low as $24,000 with unlimited VINs, product support, complete setup and maintenance.

Contact us today to simplify, integrate and track with VehicHaul.

Get the facts. Go Mobile.

We have the solutions you need to take your vehicle transportation tracking and visibility to the next level.
